EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Website_Paid Social Ad LinkedIn_PARENT_AU_NZ_Q418.Technical Form Submission
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal assets. Please find the links to these assets here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/au-linkedin-future?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=apj-website-social-linkedin]]>.
Should you be interested in speaking with a Pivotal representative, please contact us <[[https://pivotal.io/contact?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=apj-website-social-linkedin]]>.
Regards, The Pivotal Team
